faq.heading: Common Questions from Perth Restaurant Owners

items.question: How does DineTalk handle Perth-specific enquiries?
items.answer: Our AI is trained on Perth geography, local landmarks, and common customer questions specific to WA restaurants. It can provide directions, discuss parking options, and answer questions about local events and attractions.

items.question: What if a caller has a complex request?
items.answer: DineTalk handles 95% of calls autonomously. For complex situations requiring human judgment, the system can transfer calls to your staff or take detailed messages for follow-up.

items.question: Does it work with my existing POS system?
items.answer: DineTalk integrates with all major Australian POS systems including Square, Lightspeed, TouchBistro, and many others popular in Perth venues.

items.question: What happens during peak times like Friday night service?
items.answer: This is where DineTalk shines. While your team focuses on delivering exceptional dining experiences, our AI handles all incoming calls simultaneously — no busy signals, no missed opportunities.
